header.title: How It Works
header.description: From Zero to Funded: The FTM Forex Prop Trading Path

propTrading.title: What is Prop Trading?
propTrading.description: Funded Trader Markets (FTM), one of the best prop firms, provides traders with simulated funded accounts and real payouts. Traders are evaluated on performance and must follow strict risk rules. If successful, they can earn real profits while following strict risk parameters. Go beyond the limits, and the account is deactivated. Trade smart, and your capital grows.

cta.title: Ready to Begin?
cta.description: Choose the program that fits your style and start your funded trading journey today.

meta.title: How It Works
meta.description: Learn how FTM's prop trading evaluation process works.

evaluation.title: Evaluation Types
evaluation.description: Choose the path that best suits your style on our Programs page:

header.title: Your Funding Plan Starts Here
header.description: Get a funded trading account in a simulated environment through one-step, two-step, or instant programs, all with flexible rules and no time limits.

categories.count: {count, plural, one {# program available} other {# programs available}}

oneStep.title: 1 Step Programs
oneStep.description: Get funded in a single step with no time limits. Perfect for traders who want results fast and maximum profit share.

twoStep.title: 2 Step Programs
twoStep.description: Classic two-phase evaluation for those who want lower fees, more time, and a steady path to funding.

instant.title: Instant Programs
instant.description: Skip the evaluation and start trading with real capital instantly. No waiting, no challenges, just pure trading.

instant.title: Instant Funding Account
instant.description: Get funded instantly and start trading real money immediately. Perfect for experienced traders who want to skip the evaluation process.

benefits.1: Lower drawdown limits for safer trading

1-step.title: 1-Step Evaluation Program
1-step.description: Complete just one evaluation phase to prove your trading skills. A streamlined path to funded trading with competitive profit targets.

benefits.1: Higher profit targets and splits up to 100%

2-step.title: 2-Step Trading Challenge
2-step.description: Traditional two-phase evaluation process that thoroughly tests your consistency and risk management before funding.

table.empty: No programs match the selected filters.

header.title:
1-Step Nitro: One Target,
 Zero Delays.
header.description: Pass one target with no time limits to unlock your funded account. You keep 100% of your first $10,000 in profits. This is trading on your terms. Your strategy, your reward.

nitro.title: 1 Step Nitro
nitro.description: Our One Phase Nitro Program offers traders a fast track to a simulated funded account with a single evaluation phase. Designed for experienced traders.

nitroPro.title: 1 Step Nitro Pro
nitroPro.description: The 1 step Nitro Pro is the least priced one-time fee account type and it has only one evaluation phase. Suitable for traders who can successfully manage tighter drawdowns.

nitroX.title: 1 Step Nitro X
nitroX.description: The Nitro X account type has the least profit target in the challenge phase. Made for traders with good risk management prowess that want a minimal evaluation target.

comparison.title: 1 Step Program Comparison
comparison.description: Review features, rules, and payouts for all 1 Step Nitro programs and find the ideal forex funding solution for you.

benefits.title: 1-Step Benefits
benefits.description: Discover the advantages of our 1-Step Nitro programs and why they're the perfect choice for experienced traders.

capital.title: Trade Up to $800,000
capital.description: Access scalable capital across all 1 Step programs and trade with up to $800K combined.

profit.title: Up to 100% Profit
profit.description: Earn up to 100% of your profits with one of the most generous payout structures in the industry.

oneStep.title: Get Funded in Just 1 Step
oneStep.description: Take on a single-phase challenge and move directly into trading with simulated capital.

header.title: 2-Step Challenge: Built for Proven Traders
header.description: Join a two-phase evaluation with no time limits, static drawdown, and low costs. Get a funded trading account and earn up to 100% profit share.

standard.title: 2-Step Standard
standard.description: Reach 10% and 5% profit targets in two phases with a 10% overall drawdown and 3% daily drawdown limit. Keep 80% of all profits you generate.

speed.title: 2-Step Speed
speed.description: Hit 8% and 5% profit targets with a fast two-phase challenge, featuring an 8% overall drawdown and 3% daily drawdown limit. Benefit from quick evaluations and keep 80% of all profits you earn.

plus.title: 2‑Step Plus
plus.description: Accelerate your journey to funding with the 2‑Step Plus plan, the most affordable 2 Step option, and retain 80% of all profits with on-demand payouts. Trade confidently within 3% daily and 8% overall drawdown limits, while the Risk Management Layer ensures your capital is safeguarded as you reach your profit goals.

comparison.title: 2 Step Program Comparison
comparison.description: Review features, rules, and payouts for all 2 Step programs and find the ideal forex funding solution for you.

benefits.title: 2-Step Benefits
benefits.description: Discover the advantages of our 2-Step programs and why they're the perfect choice for traders who prefer a structured approach.

capital.title: Trade up to $300,000
capital.description: Manage up to $300K with your FTM 2 Step account and maximize your trading potential.

scaling.title: Exclusive Scaling Offers
scaling.description: Scale up to $3M, earn up to $5K/month, and enjoy VIP perks like 100% profit split and free challenge retries.

risk.title: Smart Risk Management
risk.description: Trade confidently with a 4% daily loss limit and a 10% static drawdown.

header.title: Instant Funding
header.description: Get instant funding with no evaluation. Access simulated capital, trade in best market conditions, and earn up to 80% profit split!

standard.title: Instant Standard
standard.description: The Instant Standard plan gives you immediate access to a simulated funded trading account with no evaluation process. Trade with real-time market conditions, manage a 5% maximum drawdown, and earn up to 80% profit through a simple one-time fee with no recurring charges.

pro.title: Instant Pro
pro.description: Designed for professional traders, the Instant Pro plan offers no daily drawdown limits and a 3% overall drawdown cap. Trade on a simulated funded account with full flexibility and earn up to 80% profit split with a one-time payment.

plus.title: Instant Plus
plus.description: Experience the perfect balance of high profit potential and Risk Management Layer with the Instant Plus plan. Start trading right away with an 80% profit split and on-demand payouts. Clear risk parameters such as a 3% daily and 6% overall limit are designed to safeguard your journey and help you trade with confidence from day one.

comparison.title: Instant Program Comparison
comparison.description: Review features, rules, and payouts for all Instant programs and find the ideal forex funding solution for you.

benefits.title: Instant Benefits
benefits.description: See why traders choose FTM's instant funding plans.

profitSplit.title: Up to 80% Profit Split
profitSplit.description: Keep up to 80% of your profits with FTM's instant funding model.

withdraw.title: Withdraw On-Demand
withdraw.description: Request your payout anytime after the minimum 5 trading days—no fixed payout dates, no restrictions.

noFreeze.title: No Buffer Freeze
noFreeze.description: Get your split on all profits generated without any freeze.

drawdownReset.title: Drawdown Reset
drawdownReset.description: After every payout, get full drawdown room to continue trading.

drawdownType.title: Balance Based Trailing Drawdown
drawdownType.description: Limits trail only after booked positions—no floating equity traps.

advantages.title: Why Traders Choose FTM?
advantages.description: Discover why FTM is a leading prop firm for instant funding, fast payouts, and funded trading accounts.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: We are here to answer to all your questions. ALL day & night

profit.title: Up to 100% Profit Split
profit.description: An easy method to get paid within 24 hours guaranteed

payouts.title: On Demand Payouts
payouts.description: Need to get your payout instantly? No problem! Get It when you want.

conditions.title: Best Conditions
conditions.description: Tight Spreads, No Swaps, and Fast Execution
